Context:
The George Brown College offers over 160 career-focused certificate, diploma, postgraduate and degree programs. Most of these programs include a field education component that provides students with the opportunity to work and learn with industry partners. The college now accepts the Duolingo English Test for pre-placement to their English for Academative Purposes (EAP) program and all Post-Secondary, Diploma, Post-Graduate Diploma and Degree programs.

For international students planning to travel to Canada, there is a "Travelling to Canada" page available on the college website with more information. The college has an FAQs section where questions about admissions, registration, and student support services can be answered or new questions can be submitted. The contact information for inquiries is ask.george@georgebrown.ca and 416-415-2000 (TTY: 1-877-515-5559). The college is active on social media and can be followed on their WeChat public account "乔治布朗学院微信公众号".

The George Brown College offers a wide range of full-time programs, with most having a field education component. They accept the Duolingo English Test for certain programs, and provide resources for international students traveling to Canada. Their contact information and social media accounts are also listed.
